Content: A ceremony to commemorate war heroes were held to coincide with the 30th anniversary of the 6th Batch of Sir John Kotalawala Defence University. The ceremony was held near the War Memorial situated close to the Parliament Complex. All war heroes in service at present, those who are disabled and those who have made the supreme sacrifice for the country were paid tributes on the occasion. Members of the war heroes families and a group of people were present on the occasion.
